DellPCIeSSD.description: An instance of DellPCIeSSD will have PCIe Solid State Drive specific data.
DellPCIeSSD.longDescription: An instance of DellPCIeSSD will have PCIe Solid State Drive specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Bus.description: This property represents the PCI bus.
Bus.longDescription: This property represents the PCI bus.

BusProtocol.description: This property represents the bus protocol.
BusProtocol.longDescription: This property represents the bus protocol.

Device.description: This property represents the PCI device.
Device.longDescription: This property represents the PCI device.

DriveFormFactor.description: This property shall represent the physical disk form factor and shall be one of the following values: 0 - Unknown, 1 - 1.8 inch,  2 - 2.5 inch,  3 - 3.5 inch, 4-2.5 inch Add-in card,  5-M.2.
DriveFormFactor.longDescription: This property shall represent the physical disk form factor and shall be one of the following values: 0 - Unknown, 1 - 1.8 inch,  2 - 2.5 inch,  3 - 3.5 inch, 4-2.5 inch Add-in card,  5-M.2.

FreeSizeInBytes.description: This property represents the free space available for a virtual disk. Note: This field value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140.
FreeSizeInBytes.longDescription: This property represents the free space available for a virtual disk. Note: This field value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140.

Function.description: This property represents the PCI function.
Function.longDescription: This property represents the PCI function.

HotSpareStatus.description: This property represents the hot-spare status and is one of the following values: 0-No, 1-Dedicated, 2-Global. Note: This value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140 controller.
HotSpareStatus.longDescription: This property represents the hot-spare status and is one of the following values: 0-No, 1-Dedicated, 2-Global. Note: This value is applicable when an NVMe drive is behind S140 controller.

MediaType.description: This property represents the drive media type.
MediaType.longDescription: This property represents the drive media type.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PCIeCapableLinkWidth.description: The property indicates the Capable Link Width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.
PCIeCapableLinkWidth.longDescription: The property indicates the Capable Link Width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.

PCIeNegotiatedLinkWidth.description: The property indicates the Negotiated Link width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.
PCIeNegotiatedLinkWidth.longDescription: The property indicates the Negotiated Link width of the PCIe SSD and is one of the following values x1, x2, x4, x8, x12, x16, x32.

ProductID.description: This property represents the DeviceID of the PCIe SSD.
ProductID.longDescription: This property represents the DeviceID of the PCIe SSD.

RAIDType.description: The property indicates type of RAID and indicates if the RAID is software based.
RAIDType.longDescription: The property indicates type of RAID and indicates if the RAID is software based.

SystemEraseCapability.description: The property indicates the storage component system-erase capability.
SystemEraseCapability.longDescription: The property indicates the storage component system-erase capability.

title: #DellPCIeSSD.v1_1_0.DellPCIeSSD
